name: doctor concoctor
description:
The doctor, with his trusty concoction-shooter, enters the futuristic ruins of Platlantis, occupied solely by platypus-inspired machines. Can you survive 4 floors of lightly-bullet-helly enemies as the concoction becomes more and more unstable?

Throughout the game you can collect items which will modify the stats and effects of your bullets in various ways. However, every item collected increases the unstability chance, which determines how often entering a room triggers an adverse effect.

Controls
  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot (you can hold the button)
  • Right click or space to dodge
  • P to toggle sound effects
  • O to toggle music
  • I to toggle hard mode (only on the title screen)
  • U to toggle fullscreen mode
